model

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Tile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile(int status)
      Tile constructor A tile has a status and an effect.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(int status)
        Tile constructor A tile has a status and an effect. The status indicates to whom the tile belongs (1 or 2 if belonging to a player, -1 if free). The effect determines if the tile is "magic" or not.
        Parameters:
        status - status values are: -1 if free, 1 or 2 if belonging to a player

    • Method Detail

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(int id)
        Set the status of the tile. Status can be: free (-1), belonging to player 1 (1) or player 2 (2)
        Parameters:
        id - the value of the status

      • setEffect

        public void setEffect(Effect effect)
        Set the effect of the tile. Any effect managed by the EffectFactory can be applied to a tile. Resets the effect usage count to 0.
        Parameters:
        effect -

      • getEffect

        public Effect getEffect()
        Returns the effect currently active on the tile
        Returns:
        an effect

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Returns the current status of a tile
        Returns:
        status, i.e. ID of the player or -1 if free

      • getEffectUseCount

        public int getEffectUseCount()
        Returns:
        The number of times the effect on the tile has been used. 0 if there is no effect or the effect has never been used. In the context of Effect.playEffect, returns the number of uses BEFORE the method call.

      • setEffectUseCount

        public void setEffectUseCount(int c)
        Sets the number of times the effect on the tile has been used.
        Parameters:
        c - usage count
